about_the_game:
We ask you to give us a part of you. Part of your identity.



Mirror Layers is a first person social horror game.
Explore the mysterious apartment 12, cooperate with other players to solve challenging puzzles and survive the horrors of the Mirror, a distorted reality tainted by tragedy.

THE PLOT




In Mirror Layers the player acts as themselves.
You received an anonymous invitation that asks you to reach Chandran Apartments, a bizarre 16 stories tall apartment complex where weird "Escape the room" games are held.
Will you join the game?


THE SOCIAL HORROR EXPERIENCE




To proceed in Mirror Layers it's necessary to interact with other players through a social network called Propaganda. Here you will be able to share advice, opinions and especially items with other people. The game also provides tools with which you can take notes and pictures; remember, "sharing" is caring!


THE ENIGMAS




The cornerstone of the game is the resolution of increasingly complex puzzles: throughout your explorations in the Apartment you're free to collect and inspect key items to better interact with them and their environment.



THE DEMO




This demo will give you only a glimpse of what you'll find in Mirror Layers. For, did you know? There's a peculiar mirror in Chandran Apartments...
To know more about it, visit Mirror Layers page on Steam.



I made contact. What are you waiting for?
